      • phrases

        public static void phrases()
                    throws java.lang.Exception
        Stores all the cue phrases from the cue_phrases.csv
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • complement

        public static java.lang.String complement(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> verbs)
        If the type of the sentence come into the division of COMPLEMENT CLAUSES, takes the input of all the list of verbs.
        Parameters:
        verbs - verbs is the list of all the indices at which the verbs are present in the input sentence.
        Returns:
        finale , the output string after the sentence is divided into clauses.

      • check_participle

        public static java.lang.String check_participle(int gerund_index,
                                                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> verbs)
        check_participle method takes the index of gerund of the v3 form of the verb from the sentence and divide the sentence accordingly
        Parameters:
        gerund_index - gerund_index is the index of VBG in the sentence.
        verbs - verbs is the list of the indices of the verbs present in the sentence
        Returns:
        finale , the output string after the sentence is divided into clauses.

      • participle

        public static java.lang.String participle(int gerund,
                                          int v3,
                                          java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> verbs)
        participle method checks for the indices of VBG and VBN tags in the sentence and call the check_participle method according to the verb phrases in which these tags are dividing the sentence into.
        Parameters:
        gerund - gerund is the index of VBG in the sentence.
        v3 - v3 is the index of VBN in the sentence
        verbs - verbs is the list of all the types of verbs present in the sentence
        Returns:
        finale , the output string after the sentence is divided into clauses.

      • comma_check

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> comma_check(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> mark,
                                                                 java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> verbs)
        comma_check is the method which takes the indices of all the commas present in the sentence and check if it divides the sentences into clauses on the basis of checking the verb-phrases
        Parameters:
        mark - mark is the list of all the commas present in the sentence.
        verbs - verbs is the list of all the indices present in the sentence.
        Returns:
        br br is the list of indices of the final set of commas which are sure to divide the sentence into clauses.

      • cue_check

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> cue_check(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> mark,
                                                               java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> verbs)
        cue_check is the method which checks clauses in all the divided clauses by the comma_check method on the basis of cue phrases which takes into account all the verb phrases.
        Parameters:
        mark - mark is the list of indices of all the commas which are dividing the sentences into clauses.
        verbs - verbs is the list of indices of all the verbs of the sentences
        Returns:
        cu cu is the list of the indices (collected and sorted) after all the cue_phrases are checked.

      • cue_check_full

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> cue_check_full(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> verbs)
        This method checks for the whole sentences for cue_phrases on the basis of all indices of verbs.
        Parameters:
        verbs - verbs is the list of indices of the verbs in the sentence.
        Returns:
        cu , the final list of the indices which will divide the sentence into clauses.

      • main

        public static java.lang.String main(java.lang.String s5)
                             throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                    java.io.IOException,
                                    java.lang.Exception
        This method divides the sentence into clauses.
        Parameters:
        s5 - s5 is the input string for which clause identification is to be done.
        Returns:
        finale , the output string which is divided on the basis of clauses present in the sentence.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.Exception
